findings: The technician was able to pressurize the cooling system and found that the coolant bypass hose is leaking, causing residue all over the engine.
The technician inspected the vehicle and found that the rear brake rotors and pads need replacement, as the rotors have been cut deeply and the pads are below minimum specifications.
The technician also recommends an oil service due to the oil being low and dirty.
The current cabin filter is dirty and discolored.
services_completed: Identified a leaking coolant bypass hose
recommendations: Replace the rear brake rotors and pads
